de.ralleytn.simple.input.internal

Class XIGamepadButtonMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.input.internal.XIGamepadButtonMapping

  • public final class XIGamepadButtonMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    Maps the JInput identifiers to the SimpleInput constants.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Method Detail

      • getAnalogStickDirection

        public static final Direction getAnalogStickDirection(float value,
                                                      float x,
                                                      float y)
        Gives the direction in which an analog stick is pushed. Had to put these methods to the gamepad mapping classes because it is different for DirectInput and XInput. XInput up and down is inverted to DirectInput.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        x - x value
        y - y value
        Returns:
        the direction in which the analog stick is pushed
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • getMap

        public static final java.util.Map<net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier,java.lang.Integer> getMap(boolean nonav)
        Parameters:
        nonav - true if the gamepad has no navigation, else false
        Returns:
        the button mapping
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getDownButtonArraySize

        public static final int getDownButtonArraySize(boolean nonav)
        Parameters:
        nonav - true if the gamepad has no navigation, else false
        Returns:
        the size for the boolean array that remembers which buttons are currently down
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isValidButton

        public static final boolean isValidButton(net.java.games.input.Component.Identifier id,
                                          boolean nonav)
        Parameters:
        id - the JInput identifier
        nonav - true if the gamepad has no navigation, else false
        Returns:
        true if the button for the JInput identifier is in the mapping
        Since:
        1.0.0
